character.statement: What happened? And why is everything so huge!?
There's a heat vent here, but it doesn't seem to be on right now.
C.J. said that Mr. Silva is the thief! I've got to get to the school and save her!
That remote-controlled car might be able to get me there, if I can just find a way to get it outside.
She wants me to flush the thumb drive. The thief must be coming for it!
But where is the thumb drive?
I see someone sending Morse code signals. If only I had a way to decipher the message...
I can't reach it from here.
PS 101... I think that's the name of the school.
That looked like the school's science classroom.
I don't see C.J. I must not have the right coordinates.
